hadiths.text: Narrated Sa`id bin Zaid:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "Whoever usurps the land of somebody unjustly, his neck will be encircled with it down the seven earths (on the Day of Resurrection)

chapter.ara-name: باب إِثْمِ مَنْ ظَلَمَ شَيْئًا مِنَ الأَرْضِ
chapter.eng-name: The sin of him who usurps the land of others
